about.summary: An object-oriented package for mathematical sets, upgrading the current gold-standard {sets}. Many forms of mathematical sets are implemented, including (countably finite) sets, tuples, intervals (countably infinite or uncountable), and fuzzy variants. Wrappers extend functionality by allowing symbolic representations of complex operations on sets, including unions, (cartesian) products, exponentiation, and differences (asymmetric and symmetric).

An object-oriented package for mathematical sets, upgrading the current gold-standard {sets}. Wrappers extend functionality by allowing symbolic representations of complex operations on sets, including unions, (cartesian) products, exponentiation, and differences (asymmetric and symmetric).

name: r-set6

about.summary: An object-oriented package for mathematical sets, upgrading the current gold-standard {sets}. Many forms of mathematical sets are implemented, including (countably finite) sets, tuples, intervals (countably infinite or uncountable), and fuzzy variants. Wrappers extend functionality by allowing symbolic representations of complex operations on sets, including unions, (cartesian) products, exponentiation, and differences (asymmetric and symmetric).

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.2.6" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-set6
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url: https://raphaels1.r-universe.dev/src/contrib/set6_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  md5: 2310d4d6607401b2d2c229dc6974fd5a

build:
  merge_build_host: true  # [win]
  number: 0
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
    - {{ compiler('c') }}          # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_c') }}    # [win]
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}        # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_cxx') }}  # [win]
    - {{ posix }}filesystem        # [win]
    - {{ posix }}make
    - {{ posix }}sed               # [win]
    - {{ posix }}coreutils         # [win]
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-r6
    - r-rcpp
    - r-checkmate
    - r-ooplah
  run:
    - r-base
    - {{ native }}gcc-libs         # [win]
    - r-r6
    - r-rcpp
    - r-checkmate
    - r-ooplah

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('set6')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('set6')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://xoopR.github.io/set6/
  dev_url: https://github.com/xoopR/set6
  license: MIT
  summary: An object-oriented package for mathematical sets, upgrading the current gold-standard {sets}. Many forms of mathematical sets are implemented, including (countably finite) sets, tuples, intervals (countably infinite or uncountable), and fuzzy variants. Wrappers extend functionality by allowing symbolic representations
    of complex operations on sets, including unions, (cartesian) products, exponentiation, and differences (asymmetric and symmetric).
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - pascal-git

about.summary: An object-oriented package for mathematical sets, upgrading the current gold-standard {sets}. Many forms of mathematical sets are implemented, including (countably finite) sets, tuples, intervals (countably infinite or uncountable), and fuzzy variants. Wrappers extend functionality by allowing symbolic representations of complex operations on sets, including unions, (cartesian) products, exponentiation, and differences (asymmetric and symmetric).
